pr_title: Revise notification behaviour for Match Exactly

timeline.message: Show auth dialog when refreshing on blank forms causes an auth error
Make sure multiple fill blank forms are not opened on sync error notification
Make sure notification cleared when sync success
Make sure notification cleared when sync success

timeline.bodyText: I decided to revise how the tests are written to drive out the new behaviour rather than just adding more. Along with the changed/new unit tests everything was TDD'd out and I'm pretty sure we didn't lose anything.
timeline.author: seadowg
